Description: We are hiring a SharePoint Content Entry Specialist for one of our clients in Doha.Candidates who have the required qualifications and good experience may apply.Skills
Skills:
Minimum 4 years of experience in editing the content of web pages in SharePoint-based websites.
Bachelor's degree in a related field or equivalent experience.
Proficient in reading and writing Arabic.
Knowledge of HTML, JavaScript, and CSS (Bootstrap framework preferred).
Familiarity with JavaScript REST API.
Experience with Office 365 tools such as Outlook, Excel, and Word.
With a valid QID and NOC
Residing in Qatar
